channel.title: kubernetes on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.19.0, 1.18.2 and 1.17.4 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.19 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.18 and 1.17 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.18.1, 1.17.3 and 1.16.5 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.18, 1.17 and 1.16 versions of the CloudNativePG operator. Version 1.16 has reached End-of-Life (EOL).

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.18.0, 1.17.2 and 1.16.4 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.18 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.17 and 1.16 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.17.1, 1.16.3 and 1.15.5 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.17, 1.16 and 1.15 versions of the CloudNativePG operator. Version 1.15 has reached End-of-Life (EOL).

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.17.0, 1.16.2 and 1.15.4 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.17 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.16 and 1.15 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.16.1 and 1.15.3 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.16.x and 1.15.x versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.16.0 and 1.15.2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.16 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.15 version of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.15.1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.15.x version of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: Running PostgreSQL the Kubernetes Way
item.description: Welcome CloudNativePG as a new open source operator that orchestrates PostgreSQL clusters inside Kubernetes!
